product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Tasmanian 2 Floor Saver Footprint - Special Buy
long_description: The Tasmanian 2 Floor Saver Footprint from ALPS Mountaineering helps protect the floor of your Tasmanian 2 Tent (sold separately). Footprint is sized to help prevent pooling of water under the tent during rainy weather. Special buy.
short_description: The Tasmanian 2 Floor Saver Footprint from ALPS Mountaineering helps protect the floor of your Tasmanian 2 Tent (sold separately).
